about_the_game:
This DLC contains new Hidden Objects Mode with 3 episodes: Stone Age, Middle Ages and Modern Age.
Try to find all the hidden objects in a real stone age cave, medieval dwelling and in a modern apartment!
Players of all ages will enjoy a hidden object game mode with a unique Doodle God twist!
